text.div: • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActClass where concept is-a HCASE

name: ActClassPublicHealthCase2
title: ActClassPublicHealthCase2
description: A public health case is a Concern about an observation or event that has a specific significance for public health. The creation of a PublicHealthCase initiates the tracking of the object of concern. The decision to track is related to but somewhat independent of the underlying event or observation.
